subject: Project deadline and next steps
body: Hi, we need the final report by Friday EOD. Please also prepare slides for Monday's review meeting.

subject: This week in AI
body: Welcome to this week's edition of TechNews AI. Here are the top stories...

subject: You won a prize!!!
body: Click here to claim your reward. Limited time only!!!

subject: Benefits enrollment open now
body: Open enrollment for benefits is now available. Please review plans and enroll by Dec 1.

subject: Request: Feature clarification and timeline
body: Can you confirm if the dashboard supports filtering by user role? We need an ETA for November 30.

subject: Registration: Product Leaders Summit
body: Early-bird registration is open for Product Leaders Summit. Save 20% using code EARLY20.

subject: Birthday lunch next week?
body: Hey — want to do lunch next Tuesday to celebrate my birthday? 12:00 or 12:30 works for me.

subject: Security notice: unusual sign-in
body: We detected a sign-in from a new device. If this wasn't you, please reset your password.

subject: Top 10 design trends in 2026
body: In this digest: color palettes, motion design, and layout systems you'll want to try.

subject: Invoice overdue - Action required
body: Your invoice INV-1234 is overdue by 10 days. Please remit payment or contact us to arrange terms.

subject: Interview request — Product Manager
body: We'd like to schedule a 45-minute interview next week. Please share availability.

subject: Sync: API migration plan
body: Quick sync today? I drafted a migration plan and a few open questions we need to resolve.

subject: Please review the Q1 campaign brief
body: Attached is the campaign brief — please provide feedback by next Wednesday.

subject: Subscription confirmation
body: You successfully subscribed to Daily Dev Tips. Manage your subscription here.

subject: Action: Please triage onboarding bugs
body: We need volunteers to triage the onboarding bugs list — please claim an item by EOD Thursday.
